attributes.action: Abolish the United Kindom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and each nation gain independence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its a well known fact that more than half the population of England,Scotland,Wales and Northern Ireland would like to gain independence. No one really sees themselves as 'British' anymore, many find it an insult to be called that.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
